content: Definitely every single book Paulo Coehlo has written. Ugh, that J.D. Salinger quote says it best. Aleph, The Alchemist and Veronika Decides To Die, changed my life immensely. Oh, and, Manuscript found in accra! I always read these while I’m traveling. Or about too. Thanks for reminding me, I should probably go back and read them again for the 1000th time now.
